posts.title: Pascal's triangle
posts.excerpt: Write a function to return the nth row in Pascal’s triangleFor example,getRow(1) returns 1getRow(2) returns 1 1getRow(3) returns 1 2 1getRow(4) returns 1 3 3 1
posts.text: Write a function to return the nth row in Pascal’s triangleFor example,getRow(1) returns 1getRow(2) returns 1 1getRow(3) returns 1 2 1getRow(4) returns 1 3 3 1

posts.title: The First Post
posts.text: My very first post The repository for this blog Quick StartClone$ git clone https://github.com/narr/blog.git Install$ npm install Run development server$ npm run server Open a browser on localhost:8080 Deploy to Github$ npm run deploy Ref. hexo hexo-theme-icarus
